meanings.definition: Operate (a computer or device) at a speed higher than it was designed for.
meanings.sent1: He enjoys overclocking his computer to make it faster.
meanings.sent2: Some tech enthusiasts like to experiment with overclocking their devices.
meanings.sent3: Overclocking his laptop turned it into a speedy little machine.
meanings.sent4: She overclocked her tablet, pushing it to its limits.
meanings.sent5: The concept of overclocking can be risky but rewarding if done right.

meanings.definition: The action or practice of operating a computer or device at a speed higher than it was designed for.
meanings.sent1: Overclocking can boost performance but may void warranties.
meanings.sent2: Many gamers engage in overclocking to enhance gaming experiences.
meanings.sent3: The art of overclocking requires precision and caution.
meanings.sent4: Overclocking is like giving your device an energy drink.
meanings.sent5: The world of overclocking is full of possibilities for tech enthusiasts.
